KingmakerVendorItems.Description: Adds Kingmaker items to various vendors throughout the acts.

CustomVendorItems.Description: Adds custom items to various vendors throughout the acts.

EnableNewQuestRewards.Description: Improves various quest item rewards throughout the acts.
